body_html:
Hi guys, i had the same error, here some logs:
PATH: home/cf/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/bin:/home/cf/anaconda3/bin:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin:/home/cf/bin:/home/cf/.local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:
LD_LYBRARY_PATH: /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:
ldd: /home/cf/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/bin/../lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.so*: No such file or directory
I'm using pytorch 0.2.0 py36h53baedd_4cu80 [cuda80] soumith on two GPU Nvidia 1080TI
I was using another version that was working but i don't remember which
Can you fix it? Thanks
